markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 13"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Translucent Skin](/Feats.aspx?ID=2615) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Undine" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=314" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Ancestry Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=74) pg. 119 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

</column>

---

Your body is translucent while underwater. Whenever you are fully submerged in water, you can [Hide](/Actions.aspx?ID=62) from other creatures even if you don't have cover against them and aren't [concealed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=4) from them.
name: Translucent Skin

text: <title level="1" right="Feat 13" pfs="Standard" > Translucent Skin Source Ancestry Guide pg. 119 2.0 --- Your body is translucent while underwater. Whenever you are fully submerged in water, you can Hide from other creatures even if you don't have cover against them and aren't concealed from them.
